sets.title: Train Delay
originals: The train left the station later than expected.
Many passengers grew impatient while waiting.
Eventually, the train arrived at its final destination safely.

options.label: B
options.text: Travelers became restless during the delay.

options.label: C
options.text: The train reached its last stop without problems.

options.label: D
options.text: The train was cancelled before it could leave.

options.label: E
options.text: Passengers enjoyed a quick and smooth journey.

paraphrasesInOrder: The departure happened later than planned.
People waiting started to lose patience.
The train made it to the end of the line in good condition.

sets.title: Birthday Cake
originals: Sarah baked a cake for her friend’s birthday.
She decorated it with colorful icing and candles.
Everyone at the party enjoyed eating it together.

options.label: A
options.text: The cake was prepared by Sarah to celebrate her friend.

options.label: B
options.text: The cake was covered with bright frosting and candles.

options.label: C
options.text: The guests happily shared the cake during the celebration.

options.label: D
options.text: Sarah bought snacks from the store instead of baking.

options.label: E
options.text: Nobody touched the cake because it was ruined.

paraphrasesInOrder: Sarah made a cake especially for her friend’s birthday.
She added candles and bright icing to decorate it.
The people at the party ate the cake together with joy.
